text: Abraham ke sunnot laga niyom laga chihna to pai loise. Etu to dharmikta biswas laga mohor hoise juntu tai sunnot nakora age te Isor pora taike di dise. Etu nimite Abraham ekjon baba hoi jaise jun biswas kori loise, jodi taikhan sunnot nakorile bhi. Etu motlob to taikhan dharmik ase koi kene taikhan ke ginti kori lobo4.11 Gen. 17:11..
